name: RandomWeather
author: Taako
description: A cog for generating random daily weather updates with realistic seasonal patterns and dramatic emergency alerts for rare extreme weather events.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the RandomWeather cog! Use `[p]rweather` for commands. Weather icons by Flaticon.
short: Smart weather generator with seasonal patterns.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
